title: Conduct Preliminary Research and Analysis
description: Gather existing data on tidal energy systems, evaluate their pros and cons, and identify potential areas for improvement in the TidalEnergyFence design.

title: Design Modular Tidal Energy Units
description: Develop a design for the modular tidal energy units that can be easily installed, maintained, and replaced.

title: Design the Installation Structure
description: Develop a design for the structure that will house the tidal energy units along coastlines, ensuring minimal ecological impact.

title: Develop a Monitoring System for Performance and Ecological Impact
description: Create a system to monitor the performance of the TidalEnergyFence as well as its impact on local ecosystems.

title: Create a Maintenance and Replacement Plan
description: Develop a plan for maintaining and replacing the tidal energy units and the TidalEnergyFence as needed.

title: Prepare RFC: Ecological Impact Assessment
description: Write a Request for Comments (RFC) detailing the expected ecological impact of the TidalEnergyFence.

title: Review Ecological Impact Assessment RFC
description: Review the Ecological Impact Assessment RFC and provide feedback for revision.

title: Prepare RFC: Performance and Safety Standards
description: Write a Request for Comments (RFC) detailing the performance and safety standards for the TidalEnergyFence.

title: Review Performance and Safety Standards RFC
description: Review the Performance and Safety Standards RFC and provide feedback for revision.
dependencies: Prepare RFC: Performance and Safety Standards
